subject: Re: [junit] Problem accessing static methods
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to write junits for a class which access a static method of another class. I am getting static initialization error and the test case fails,
messageBody:
Hi,

I am trying to write junits for a class which access a static method of another class. I am getting static initialization error and the test case fails, though the functionality is correct.

Plz help

jose
